articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Foreigners and Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Foreigners and Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Monday met and had talks with heads of delegations of different countries and overseas Koreans who participated in the 7th Pyongyang International Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition.
					 On hand were Kim Jong Suk, chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairperson of the organizing committee of the exhibition, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The 7th Pyongyang Int'l Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Centre for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Monday.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are latest scientific and technological books and data contributed by organizations from at least 50 countries including the DPRK, China, Russia, Nigeria, New Zealand, Germany, Singapore, UK, Italy, Spain, Egypt, Thailand, France and Poland and an organization of overseas compatriots and international organizations including the International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources.  
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairperson of the organizing committee of the exhibition, and others, officials in the fields of education and media and scientists and technicians. 
					
					 On hand were delegations and delegates of various countries, international organizations and a delegation of overseas compatriots, diplomatic envoys of different countries and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk said in her opening speech that the exhibition has so far been held successfully under the deep care of the WPK and the government of the DPRK, contributing to the development of scientific and technological exchange among countries. 
					
					 She went on:
					
					 The exhibition has become regular and grown in its scope. This goes to prove the common desire of humankind to exchange the mutual achievements and experience and dynamically push forward the scientific and technological development. 
					
					 Hoping that the exhibition would prove to be a signal success thanks to the sincere efforts and positive activities of the participants, she declared the exhibition open. 
					
					 Li Lu, head of a delegation of Chinese press officials, said in a congratulatory speech that the exhibition has contributed to boosting the cultural exchange, cooperation and friendship among countries. 
					
					 She expressed belief that the Korean people rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il would open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 She sincerely hoped that the exhibition would be successfully held and the DPRK would further prosper. 
					
					 After the ceremony, the participants looked round the books and data on display.

articles.title: Reception Given for Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Exhibition
articles.content:
Reception Given for Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Exhibition
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The Organizing Committee for the 7th Pyongyang International Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries arranged a reception for the participants in the exhibition at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were delegations and delegates of various countries, international organizations, overseas compatriots participating in the exhibition and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 On hand were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairperson of the organizing committee of the exhibition, and others and officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Inoki Genome Federation President Here
articles.content:
Inoki Genome Federation President Here
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genome Federation Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party arrived here on Monday to participate in the 12th Pyongyang International Film Festival.

articles.title: Gift from Syrian Personage
articles.content:
Gift from Syrian Personage
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the director of the Commerce and Industry and Real Estate Investment Company at a province in Syria on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Syria on Sept. 6.

articles.title: Gifts from Russia and the New Zealand Associations
articles.content:
Gifts from Russia and the New Zealand Associations
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia, Far Eastern National University of Russia and the New Zealand-DPRK Society.
					 The gifts were separately handed over to an official concerned by Georgii Toloraya, head of the delegation of the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia, Vladimir Verkholyak, member of the delegation of Far Eastern National University of Russia, and Richard Lawrence, delegate of Waikato Institute of Technology of New Zealand, who are participating in the 7th Pyongyang International Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition.

articles.title: Stamps Issued for Kim Il Sung's 100th Birthday
articles.content:
Stamps Issued for Kim Il Sung's 100th Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau has begun issuing a series of postage stamps showing the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung to mark his 100th birth anniversary. The first part of the series (two souvenir sheets and five sheetlets) has already been brought out.
					 The stamps, titled "The Sun of the Nation," have such inscriptions as "100th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and "Juche 1 (1912)-Juche 101 (2012)."
					
					 The sheets carry pictures of the President successfully guiding the arduous march during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and making the first speech in the liberated homeland after his triumphant return.
					
					 Printed in the sheetlets are photos of the President getting patriotic education from his parents, leaving home and crossing the River Amnok at the age of 13 with an ambition to win back the independence of the country, leading youth and students in the struggle against the Jilin-Hoeryong railway project launched by the Japanese imperialists in days of his early revolutionary activities and delivering the historic speech "The Path of the Korean Revolution" at a meeting of senior cadres of the Young Communist League and the Anti-imperialist Youth League in Kalun, China.
					
					 The stamps also contain pictures showing such revolutionary feats of the President as the organization of an anti-Japanese guerilla army, founding of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland for the unity of all patriotic forces and the Pochonbo battle he brought to victory in the period of the anti-Japanese war. 
					
					Seen in a sheetlet is a picture of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk safeguarding the President at the risk of her life and pictures showing immortal exploits of the heroine, who brought up  Kim Jong Il to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche through generations.
					
					 The series of stamps will continue to be published until April 2012.

articles.title: Posters for Film Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters for Film Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Posters for the 12th Pyongyang International Film Festival were produced.
					 They reflect the desire of the Korean people and other world progressives to promote the development of movies of nations and consolidate exchange and cooperation in cinema field. 
					
					 A poster carrying letters "Welcome" and a bouquet greets the participants of the festival who visit the DPRK with friendly feelings toward the Korean people. 
					
					 There is a poster carrying letters "Independence", "Peace" and "Friendship" representing the desire of humankind to live happily in the world free from aggression and war and the idea of the festival. 
					
					 Posters introducing films of different countries to be screened at the festival and depicting torchlight prize against the background of fireworks being displayed in the nocturnal sky of Pyongyang add to the significance of the festival.

articles.title: Economic Achievements Made in Hamhung
articles.content:
Economic Achievements Made in Hamhung
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Remarkable achievements have been made in production and construction in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex has newly been equipped with the Songun Iron Foundry and the Songun Compressor Shop to turn out various kinds of castings and efficient compressors.
					
					 The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex is pushing ahead with a gasification project, with large-scale structures built and large-sized equipment installed.
					
					 It has undergone a complete change, streamlining its production processes to boost the output of fertilizers and contribute to fully solving the shortage of food.
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex has completed a huge project for raising its production capacity in months.
					
					 Light industry factories in the city, including the Hamhung Woolen Mill and the Hamhung Shoes Factory, have sharply increased the production of varied consumer goods needed for the improvement of the people's livelihood. Such achievements have also been made by the Hamhung Steel Works and the Hamhung Railway Bureau.

articles.title: Pomhyanggi Cosmetics Enjoy Popularity
articles.content:
Pomhyanggi Cosmetics Enjoy Popularity
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Pomhyanggi-trademarked cosmetics produced by the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are popular in the country.  
					 They are in good demand not only in towns but in rural communities throughout the country.
					
					 They are made with quality mineral water, well-known Kaesong Koryo insam (ginseng) essence and various herbs. 
					
					 Different kinds of facial cream, lotion and hair treatment help protect the skin and prevent aging and loss of hair.
					
					  The factory has concentrated on developing new kinds of functional cosmetics based on advanced science and technology. 
					
					 It has already developed some ten kinds of functional cosmetics, including cream for protecting aging, whitening lotion and nutritive liquid and dishcloth gourd lotion.  
					
					 They are marketable at home and in other countries, including China and Venezuela.   
					
					 Kim Mu Hyon, chief of the technological section of the factory, told KCNA that the demand of the new cosmetics was ever increasing among not only women but also men.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Will Be Evergreen
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Will Be Evergreen
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-China friendship is genuine, fraternal and unbreakable one which has steadily developed with long-standing history and good tradition on the basis of comradeship. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il's recent visit to China marked a significant event as it helped further deepen the comradeship between the two parties and leaders of the DPRK and China and put the traditional DPRK-China friendship on a higher level, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Through his recent China visit he provided a fresh landmark of the unbreakable DPRK-China friendship, a precious wealth common to the peoples of the DPRK and China, and injected inexhaustible energy into the DPRK-China relations in the new century heading for steady progress.
					
					 His historic visit to China serves as a reliable foundation and a precious source for developing the solid friendship between the two parties and peoples of the DPRK and China. 
					
					 Through his China visit he set a living example in boosting the friendly relations among the countries desirous of solidarity and cooperation under the banner of independence and made a great contribution to protecting peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and advancing the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism.   
					
					 Kim Jong Il's visit to China dealt a blow at the imperialists pursuing a wild ambition for hegemony and world domination, engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices, and instilled confidence and courage into the people struggling to materialize the noble idea common to humankind -- independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Living, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement titled "Let us protect peace on the Korean Peninsula by concluding a peace treaty free from the U.S. forces" on Sept. 8.
					 It accused the U.S. forces of frantically staging south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises while keeping south Korea under its occupation for the last 65 years, steadily revising and supplementing the plans for a war of aggression against the DPRK including "OPLAN 5027" and "OPLAN 5030" and disturbing inter-Korean dialogue to lay hurdles in the way of achieving the reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is now egging the Lee Myung Bak warlike forces on to intensify armed provocations against the DPRK under the false pretence of the warship "Cheonan" case, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out there any time owing to the moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial forces. It is the basic way of averting a war to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and conclude a peace treaty as early as possible. 
					
					 The U.S. should put an end to the dangerous racket for a war against the DPRK and withdraw its troops from south Korea. Otherwise it will face the actions of all the people to defend peace.

articles.title: Suppression of Reunification Champion under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Reunification Champion under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea made public a statement on September 10 denouncing the puppet prosecution's unreasonable suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a reunification champion.
					 Referring to the fact that the prosecution branded Rev. Han's visit to the north as "a special infiltration for receiving instructions" and labeled what he said in the north as "acts praising the system in the north" and "benefiting the enemy", the statement held that this is nothing but a typical coloring offensive.
					
					 It urged the prosecution not to crack down on Rev. Han who worked hard for the reunification of the country but punish those responsible for bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse while pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The people will never pardon the authorities for violating democracy and blocking the way of reunification by invoking a fascist law, the statement declared, strongly demanding the authorities stop at once the unreasonable suppression of Rev. Han.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Ministries, political parties, organizations and institutions and personages of various social standings of different countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries between Sep. 3 and 8 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 They included the Vietnam Ministries of Defence, Foreign Affairs, Transportation, Agriculture and Rural Development, Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Department for International Cooperation of the Ministry of Public Security, the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Farmers Union, the Ho Chi Minh Museum, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Institute for Northeast Asian Studies of the Academy of Social Science, the VietnamÔºçDPRK Friendship Association, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, the Viettel Group of Vietnam, the Vantue Investment and Technological Exchange Corporation, the Thang Long Corporation, the International SOS Hospital, the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, the Cambodian People's Party, the Funcinpec Party, the Ministries of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, Defense, the Interior, Commerce and Women Affai
					
					 rs, the Mexican Workers' Party, the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party, the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Fellowship Institute to Honor the Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the Foreign Ministry of Iran, the Islamic Revolutionary Proletarian Organization, the Ministry of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics, the Workers' House and the International Taekwon-Do Association of Iran, the Syrian vice-president, the foreign minister, the minister of Defence, the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces, the president of the Trade Unions Federation and the chairman of the General Union of Peasants of Syria, a deputy regional secretary of the Arab Baath
					
					  Socialist Party and the director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of the party, the chairman of the National Council of the National Assembly of Vietnam, the head of the group of advisers to the King of Cambodia, the minister of State for Foreign Affairs of India and the Egyptian foreign minister.

articles.title: DPRK Birthday Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar, a film show and a photo exhibition were held in Bangladesh, a lecture and a photo exhibition in Guinea and a reception and a film show in Thailand on August 31 and September 1 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the photo exhibitions were photos showing the undying revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons. 
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films. 
					
					 Speakers at the seminar in Bangladesh said that with the foundation of the DPRK by President 
						Kim Il Sung Korea could proudly emerge a full-fledged independent and sovereign state in the international arena.
					
					 Now the DPRK is demonstrating its might as political and ideological power and this would have been unthinkable without the tested leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, they said, adding that the DPRK will prosper under his leadership.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, said in the lecture that the DPRK is a military power no one dare provoke. It has already assumed the position of politico-ideological and military giant and is now dashing to be an economic power, he added.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said at a reception that Kim Il Sung fathered the Juche idea, the guiding idea in the era of independence, and applied it to the state activities and social life, thus winning shining victory in every step of the Korean revolution. The exploits of the President are further shining thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: DPRK Birthday Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK Birthday Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Peruvian organizations issued bulletins on Sept. 3 to mark the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism carried in its bulletin articles under the title of "DPRK greeting its 62nd birthday" and such subtitles as "Heroic struggle of the Korean people against foreign aggressors," "Anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle," "Foundation of the Juche idea" and "Birth of Juche Korea", which introduced in detail about how the DPRK was founded and the historic significance of its birth. 
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship noted in articles of its bulletin that the DPRK has steadfastly defended the principles of Juche in idea, independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence and firmly established the all-people and nationwide defence system with the Korean People's Army, which displays its might as an invincible army, as its core.
					
					 The DPRK is working world-startling miracles by putting spurs to the economic construction, the bulletin said, and went on: All-people general offensive is being pushed forward to fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, true to the intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. This is the present reality of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), stresses that the 60 year-long history of the DPRK is a great history of struggle and victory, creation and change in which its people have defended the independence and honor of the country and built the prosperous and powerful socialist state, going through the tempest of revolution under the great leader and the great party. Expounded in it is also the idea that even a small and backward country can turn into a developed and dignified power when it is guided by the great leader and the great party. 
					
					 It indicates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun. 
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work was held by the association on September 7.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica Unhwa de Manpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica Unhwa de Manpho
Pyongyang, 13 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica Unhwa de Manpho que libra energicamente la campana de conquista de tecnologia de punta.
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la fabrica, se entero en detalles del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion recorriendo el interior y el exterior de la fabrica reconstruida.
					
					Al ver los procesos de produccion, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros de la fabrica trajeron el cambio trascendental en la produccion realizando en corto tiempo la modernizacion y la cientifizacion basadas en la tecnologia sofisticada e investigando la nueva tecnologia y evaluo altamente a ellos que han acabado en un corto plazo la obra de reconstruccion tecnica tan dificil y complicada.
					
					Es un exito extraordinario el que particularmente, los funcionarios y los tecnicos de la fabrica hayan cambiado radicalmente en unos anos la fisonomia de la fabrica al perfeccionar el sistema de automatizacion unificada al estilo coreano a base de la aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC en los procesos productivos generales mediante la cooperacion creativa con los profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, y hayan aumentado trascendentalmente la produccion aun ahorrando muchas materias primas y materiales, senalo y dio agradecimiento a dichos profesores e investigadores y los trabajadores de las unidades relacionadas quienes hicieron gran aporte a la reconstruccion tecnica de la citada planta.
					
					Subrayo que en el pasado, el colectivo de los investigadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek contribuyo grandemente a la labor para realizar la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de las fabricas y las empresas y expreso gran confianza de que en el futuro tambien ellos cumpliran el papel vanguardista en la lucha por resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos necesarios al desarrollo de la industria del pais.
					
					Destaco que en los ultimos anos la fabrica invento  decenas de nuevas tecnicas valiosas y elevo rapidamente la produccion y anadio que esto es el fruto valioso de la batalla de conquista de tecnologia de punta que ella vino librando energicamente con la extraordinaria decision de hacer brillar nuestra patria en el mundo mediante la competencia de cerebros y tecnologias.
					
					Aprecio altamente el estilo de trabajo revolucionario, la actitud de la labor emprendedora y el noble amor por la patria y la fabrica de los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de la fabrica quienes avanzan e innovan continuamente sin estancamiento de un momento.
					
					La fabrica debe marchar continuamente para alcanzar el nivel mas alto de ciencia y tecnica a base de los exitos de aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC, senalo y fijo la meta que la fabrica debera conquistar en un tiempo cercano y resolvio los problemas que se presentan ante ella.
					
					Al ver varios productos de consumo popular elaborados eficientemente con los materiales residuales, apunto que es alta la calidad de articulos y evaluo el espiritu de servicio de ellos quienes hacen ingentes esfuerzos por mejorar la vida del pueblo.
					
					Al recorrer el comedor, el taller de elaboracion de soya, construidos nuevamente, y otras instalaciones de servicio, se mostro muy satisfecho de que haya ofrecido las magnificas condiciones de vida a los obreros y subrayo que se van bien todas las cosas de la fabrica incluyendo la produccion, gracias al firme aseguramiento de la intendencia.
					
					Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los obreros de la fabrica cumpliran magnificamente en el futuro tambien con su papel de vanguardia y de brigada en la digna lucha por conquistar la tecnologia de punta. 
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Thae Jong Su y Hong Sok Hyong.

articles.title: Inaugurada VII exposicion internacional de libros de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurada VII exposicion internacional de libros de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 13 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada este lunes en el Centro de Intercambio Cultural con el Extranjero de Pyongyang la VII Exposicion Internacional de Libros Cientifico-Tecnicos de Pyongyang.
					En la sede de exposicion fueron expuestos los libros y datos de ciencias y tecnologias de punta presentados por mas de 50 entidades de Corea, China, Rusia, Nigeria, Nueva Zelanda, Alemania, Singapur, Gran Bretana, Italia, Espana, Egipto, Tailandia, Francia y Polonia, las entidades de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y las organizaciones internacionales como la Union Internacional para la Conservacion de Naturaleza y Recurso Natural.
					
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del comite organizador del evento, Kim Jong Suk, y otros c funcionarios de las ramas de educacion y prensa, los cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Ademas, participaron las delegaciones y los delegados de varios paises, organizaciones internacionales y de los coreanos en ultramar, los representantes diplomaticos y otros miembros de las embajadas de varios paises acreditados en Corea.
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso inaugural, Kim Jong Suk senalo que esta feria de libros vino realizandose exitosamente hasta la fecha bajo la profunda atencion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea contribuyendo al desarrollo de intercambio cientifico-tecnico entre los paises.
					
					 Esta feria tiene lugar regularmente adquiriendo cada vez mayor dimension y esto demuestra la aspiracion comun de la humanidad a intercambiar los exitos y experiencias e impulsar con dinamismo el desarrollo cientifico-tecnico, subrayo.
					
					  Declaro inaugurada la VII edicion de la exposicion deseando que ella resulte fructifera gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros y actividades energicas de los participantes.
					
					  El jefe de la delegacion de los funcionarios de la rama de prensa de China, Li Lu, en su discurso de felicitacion, senalo que la exposicion de Pyongyang contribuye a fortalecer el intercambio cultural, la cooperacion y la amistad entre los paises.
					
					  Expreso su conviccion de que el pueblo coreano, unido firmemente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, abrira las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en el ano del centenario de natalicio del Presidente     Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Deseo de todo corazon que se realice con exito la presente exposicion y prospere mas la RPDC.
					
					  Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes pasaron revista a los libros y datos exhibidos.

articles.title: Iniciada emision de sellos seriales por el centenario de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Iniciada emision de sellos seriales por el centenario de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 13 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Buro Estatal de Sellos dio a luz 2 papeles enterizos de pequeno tamano y 5 de dimension normal como primera emision de los sellos en serie dedicados al centenario (15 de abril de 2012) de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					 En los sellos intitulados "El Sol de la nacion" estan escritas las siguientes frases: "El centenario de natalicio del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung" y "El 1 (1912) de la Era Juche - El 101 (2012) de la Era Juche".
					
					 Los papeles enterizos de pequeno tamano contienen las fotos del Presidente conduciendo a la victoria la marcha penosa durante el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa y pronunciando su primer discurso despues de su retorno triunfal a la patria despues de la liberacion.
					
					  Por otra parte, los otros papeles enterizos recogen las fotos del Presidente recibiendo de sus padres la educacion patriotica y cruzando a los 13 anos de edad el rio Amnok con el gran proposito de restaurar el pais.
					
					Las otras fotos describen a el dirigiendo a los jovenes y estudiantes al frente de la lucha contra la construccion del ferrocarril Jilin-Hoeryong en la epoca de sus primeras actividades revolucionarias y pronunciando su discurso historico "El camino a seguir por la revolucion coreana" en la Conferencia de Cuadros Dirigentes de la Union de la Juventud Comunista y la Union de la Juventud Antiimperialista, celebrada en Kalun.
					
					Los sellos reflejan tambien las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente como la fundacion de la Guerrilla Antijaponesa y de la Asociacion para la Restauracion de la Patria -organizacion nacida durante los dias de la lucha antijaponesa para agrupar a amplias fuerzas patrioticas-, la conduccion al triunfo de la batalla de Pochonbo, etc.
					
					Hay tambien un papel enterizo que tiene en su centro el retrato de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk defendiendo con vida al Presidente y muestra en escenas impresionantes las hazanas de ella quien garantizo la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche al dar a luz al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los sellos seriales, que sintetizan la historia revolucionaria del Presidente, se emitiran hasta abril de 2012, mes del centenario de su nacimiento.

articles.title: Sera eterna la amistad Corea-China, ratifica Rodong Sinmun

Sera eterna la amistad Corea-China, ratifica Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que las relaciones de amistad Corea-China son las verdaderas, fraternales e inquebrantables que vinieron fortaleciendose y desarrollandose incesantemente de siglo en siglo con la larga historia y magnifica tradicion a base de la camaraderia.
					La reciente visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a China deviene una ocasion importante que estrecho mas la camaraderia entre los dirigentes de ambos partidos y paises y llevo la tradicional amistad bilateral a una etapa mas alta, apunta el rotativo y prosigue:
					
					Ademas, el Dirigente preparo la nueva hoja de ruta de la amistad Corea-China, valiosa riqueza comun de los pueblos de los dos paises, y revitalizo las relaciones bilaterales del nuevo siglo que aspiran al desarrollo continuo.
					
					Por lo tanto, esta visita historica deviene la base fidedigna y fuente preciosa del desarrollo de las solidas relaciones de amistad entre los partidos y los pueblos de Corea y China.
					
					A traves de su reciente visita a China, el Dirigente sento el ejemplo del desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los paises aspirantes a la unidad y la cooperacion bajo la bandera de la independencia e hizo gran contribucion a peservar la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y a impulsar la causa de independencia y la socialista de las masas populares.
					
					Y dio un golpe duro a los imperialistas que persiguen la heguemonia mundial practicando el despotismo y arbitrariedades e inspiro la fe y coraje en los pueblos que luchan por realizar el noble ideal comun de la humanidad sobre la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
